public class HistogCanvas
extends javax.microedition.lcdui.CustomItem

The class is reponisble of drawing histograph.

Suha

drawHistogram(javax.microedition.lcdui.Graphics)

drawHistogram

void drawHistogram(javax.microedition.lcdui.Graphics g)
The function draw histograph depending on the number of bars in the array bar. Then it diving the drawing array between number of bar.

Parameters:
g - reference to the graphic area.
